description:
Bad Judge has been disbarred and it’s R.I.P. for A to Z as two more fall shows have fallen prey to the broadcast ax.NBC电视台今年秋季的两部新剧《坏法官》和《恋爱手册》在被宣布被砍掉。

NBC announced Friday it will not produce any more episodes of the two Thursday night comedies beyond their initial orders. Bad Judge has shot 10 episodes; A to Z has shot 11. Five episodes each have aired. Both shows will finish production on their 13 episodes and all will air, but NBC has confirmed it will not order episodes beyond that. So the duo are sort of like zombies for the next eight weeks.NBC周五宣布，在原定的剧集播完之后，将不会再制作更多这两部电视剧更多剧集。《坏法官》已经拍了10集，《恋爱手册》已经拍了11集。这两部剧现在都刚刚才播出第5集。这两部剧都将会完整播出之前被预订的13集，然后结束。NBC已明确表示不会再续订。所以这剩下的8个星期这两部剧可以开启等死模式了。

title: NBC新剧《坏法官》《恋爱手册》被砍
